programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The various warring factions of Westeros receive news of the events of the wedding at the Twins. In Kings Landing, Joffrey stands up to his grandfather Tywin, Daenerys discovers whether shell be remembered as a conqueror or a liberator in Yunkai, and mercy comes from a surprising source in Dragonstone. Fantasy drama, starring Emilia Clarke, Charles Dance and Jack Gleeson

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Tyrion is sent out to welcome a royal party from Dorne outside the walls of Kings Landing, and Jon Snow finds himself on trial at Castle Black over his time with the wildlings and the death of Qhorin Halfhand. Daenerys heads toward the slave city of Meereen, and Arya runs into a familiar face. Fantasy drama, starring Peter Dinklage, Emilia Clarke and Kit Harington

programme.title: The White Lotus
programme.desc: Jaclyns resort getaway with friends falls flat when the destination proves less exciting than expected, Piper seeks support for a family announcement aboard a yacht, and Rick reveals his past to Chelsea

programme.title: Atomic
programme.desc: Max and JJ try to win back the uranium in Casablanca, but the pair face a choice as the cartel closes in. Action adventure, with Alfie Allen and Shazad Latif

programme.title: True Detective
programme.desc: Hays recalls the early days of his romance with Amelia, and some of the cracks that began to show after they married and had children together. Back in the present day, ten years after the Purcell crimes took place, Hays is presented with a second chance to vindicate himself and the investigation

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Tony eyes up a new car and its attractive saleswoman, while Christopher gives Adriana her own music club to manage. Anthony Jr gets his comeuppance for vandalising the school swimming pool. Drama, starring James Gandolfini and Lorraine Bracco

programme.title: Succession
programme.desc: Logan and team head to Virginia for a conservative political conference, where Roman finds out surprising news about his mother

programme.title: Dexter: New Blood
programme.desc: The serial killer drama continues, as Dexter struggles to outrun his history of violence

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Daenerys and her entourage discover Yunkais powerful friends are the Second Sons, an elite army of mercenaries. Determined to take the city and increase the strength of her own forces, the queen agrees to meet the sellsword companys captains - intending to make them a better offer. Meanwhile, Davos is still desperate to make Stannis see clearly and demands to see proof of Melisandres power. There is a wedding in Kings Landing, and beyond the Wall, Sam and Gilly have a chilling encounter with a foe that seems to have come straight from their nightmares. Fantasy drama, starring Emilia Clarke and Liam Cunningham

programme.title: In Treatment
programme.desc: Lauras latest session with Paul leads to a series of unexpected revelations. Drama, starring Gabriel Byrne

programme.title: Fox and Hare Save the Forest
programme.desc: A fox and a hare embark on a journey to find their missing owl friend. Animated adventure, with the voices of Teresa Gallagher, Dan Skinner and Sarah Madigan

programme.title: Rango
programme.desc: A pet chameleon with an active imagination ends up lost in the desert. He makes his way to a lawless town of animals, where he is mistaken for a deadly gunslinger and made sheriff. He organises the townsfolk into a posse when bandits led by an evil rattlesnake steal their supply of water. Oscar-winning animated comedy, with the voices of Johnny Depp, Isla Fisher and Bill Nighy

programme.title: Transformers One
programme.desc: Years before the sentient robots became arch enemies, Optimus Prime and Megatron were friends on their home planet of Cybertron. However, their feud changes the universe forever. Animated sci-fi adventure, with the voices of Chris Hemsworth, Brian Tyree Henry, Scarlett Johansson and Keegan-Michael Key

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.desc: A hero is needed to defend a peaceful valley community from attack by a rampaging snow leopard. The unlikely candidate for the job is a lazy panda, who enlists the aid of a legendary team of animal fighters and their wise master to teach him the martial arts skills he needs to fulfil his destiny. Animated comedy, with the voices of Jack Black, Dustin Hoffman, Angelina Jolie, Ian McShane and Jackie Chan

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
programme.desc: The animal-loving family heads for Africa, where Eliza discovers unscrupulous poachers are plotting to kill an entire herd of elephants with the aid of a deadly electric fence, leaving her and ever-present pal Darwin to save the day. Animated adventure, with the voices of Lacey Chabert, Tim Curry, Tom Kane, Cree Summer, Lynn Redgrave and Jodi Carlisle

programme.title: Bon Voyage, Charlie Brown (and Dont Come Back!)
programme.desc: Animated adventure as Charlie Brown, Snoopy and the rest of the Peanuts gang visit England and France on an exchange trip - but the perpetually worried youngster is concerned by a mysterious letter. With the voices of Arrin Skelley, Laura Planting, Daniel Anderson and Casey Carlson

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: An alien on the run from his own people arrives on Earth and embarks on an adventure with a daring young woman. It turns out to be a life-changing trip during which they begin to understand the true meaning of the word home. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Jim Parsons, Rihanna, Steve Martin and Jennifer Lopez

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 2
programme.desc: Martial arts master panda Po continues to hone his skills when an evil peacock, who was banished from China for trying to build a deadly new weapon, returns to cause more chaos. It falls to Po to defeat him, but he suffers strange flashbacks revealing a connection between his past and the sinister bird. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Jack Black and Gary Oldman

programme.title: Trolls
programme.desc: A tribe of perpetually happy fuzzy-headed creatures are kidnapped by a race of giants who intend to eat them. The princess of the clan escapes and plans a rescue mission - but to save her friends, she will need the help of a grumpy troll with a loathing of music who has rejected their joyful culture to live as a loner. Animated musical, with the voices of Anna Kendrick and Justin Timberlake

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
programme.desc: The animal-loving family heads for Africa, where Eliza discovers unscrupulous poachers are plotting to kill an entire herd of elephants with the aid of a deadly electric fence, leaving her and ever-present pal Darwin to save the day. Animated adventure, with the voices of Lacey Chabert, Tim Curry, Tom Kane, Cree Summer, Lynn Redgrave and Jodi Carlisle

programme.title: Into the Wonderwoods
programme.desc: Young Angelo dreams of becoming an explorer and a zoologist. When he goes to visit his granny, his parents leave him behind at a rest stop, and he decides to cut through the forest in search of them. Animated adventure, featuring the voice of Kristen McGuire

programme.title: Open Season: Scared Silly
programme.desc: Boog, Elliot and their pals team up to track down an elusive werewolf and prevent their forest from being intruded upon by hunter Shaw. Animation, with the voice of Will Townsend and Donny Lucas

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Monster Mayhem
programme.desc: The Dark Knight and his allies pursue four supervillains who have joined forces to cause havoc on Halloween. They discover the gang is working for the Joker, who has a grander scheme in mind - unleashing a computer virus that will make every piece of technology in Gotham City obey his commands. Animated adventure, with the voices of Roger Craig Smith and Troy Baker

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Cowboy Up!
programme.desc: The feuding duo wind up in the Wild West where they help save a ranch from the hands of a villain. They also try to help a cowgirl and her brother save their homestead from a greedy land-grabber. Animated adventure, with the voices of George Ackles and Sean Burgos

programme.title: Rugrats Go Wild
programme.desc: A leaky boat leaves the precocious youngsters stranded on a jungle island, but their luck changes when explorers the Wild Thornberrys come to their rescue. However, Thornberry dad Nigel loses his memory, so it falls to his daughter Eliza to save the day. Childrens animated adventure, with the voices of Nancy Cartwright, Bruce Willis, Lacey Chabert, Elizabeth Daily and Tim Curry

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: A raccoon trickster is fretting about his debt to a fearsome bear when he stumbles on some animals waking in the woods after their winter nap. Spotting the chance to solve his problem, the raccoon dupes the gullible creatures into stealing food from a nearby suburb so he can give it to the bear - but they fail to realise they will soon be at the mercy of a vermin exterminator. Animated comedy, with the voices of Bruce Willis, Steve Carell, Garry Shandling and William Shatner

programme.title: The Amazing Maurice
programme.desc: A streetwise cat has the perfect money-making scam after finding a pipe-playing kid who has a horde of strangely literate rats. Animated adventure based on the Terry Pratchett story, featuring the voices of Hugh Laurie, Emilia Clarke and David Thewlis

programme.title: Bon Voyage, Charlie Brown (and Dont Come Back!)
programme.desc: Animated adventure as Charlie Brown, Snoopy and the rest of the Peanuts gang visit England and France on an exchange trip - but the perpetually worried youngster is concerned by a mysterious letter. With the voices of Arrin Skelley, Laura Planting, Daniel Anderson and Casey Carlson

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 2
programme.desc: Martial arts master panda Po continues to hone his skills when an evil peacock, who was banished from China for trying to build a deadly new weapon, returns to cause more chaos. It falls to Po to defeat him, but he suffers strange flashbacks revealing a connection between his past and the sinister bird. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Jack Black and Gary Oldman

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: An alien on the run from his own people arrives on Earth and embarks on an adventure with a daring young woman. It turns out to be a life-changing trip during which they begin to understand the true meaning of the word home. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Jim Parsons, Rihanna, Steve Martin and Jennifer Lopez

programme.title: Trolls
programme.desc: A tribe of perpetually happy fuzzy-headed creatures are kidnapped by a race of giants who intend to eat them. The princess of the clan escapes and plans a rescue mission - but to save her friends, she will need the help of a grumpy troll with a loathing of music who has rejected their joyful culture to live as a loner. Animated musical, with the voices of Anna Kendrick and Justin Timberlake

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin: The Secret of the Unicorn
programme.desc: A reporters purchase of a model ship brings him under threat from a ruthless criminal, as it is one of a series of clues to the location of the real vessel, which holds a pirates lost treasure. He sets off on a globetrotting quest to find it, assisted by a drunken sea captain, two bumbling detectives and his faithful dog. Steven Spielbergs animated adventure based on Herges comic-strip series, with the voices of Jamie Bell, Andy Serkis and Daniel Craig

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: The clumsy hero is reunited with his long-lost father, whose help he will need when a supernatural foe threatens all of China. Father and son travel to a secret village populated by other pandas, and must train them in martial arts so they can defend their home. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Jack Black, Bryan Cranston, Angelina Jolie and Dustin Hoffman

programme.title: Monsters vs Aliens
programme.desc: A woman is exposed to radiation from a meteorite that causes her to grow to an enormous size during her wedding. She is captured by the military and held prisoner with an assortment of strange creatures - but when aliens invade, these freaks of nature are the only ones capable of saving the world. Animated sci-fi comedy, with the voices of Reese Witherspoon and Hugh Laurie

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: A raccoon trickster is fretting about his debt to a fearsome bear when he stumbles on some animals waking in the woods after their winter nap. Spotting the chance to solve his problem, the raccoon dupes the gullible creatures into stealing food from a nearby suburb so he can give it to the bear - but they fail to realise they will soon be at the mercy of a vermin exterminator. Animated comedy, with the voices of Bruce Willis, Steve Carell, Garry Shandling and William Shatner

programme.title: Fox and Hare Save the Forest
programme.desc: A fox and a hare embark on a journey to find their missing owl friend. Animated adventure, with the voices of Teresa Gallagher, Dan Skinner and Sarah Madigan

programme.title: Straight Outta Nowhere: Scooby-Doo! Meets Courage the Cowardly Dog
programme.desc: The Mystery, Inc. gang heads to Nowhere, Kansas, home of Courage and his owners Eustace and Muriel Bagge, to investigate a strange object

Animated adventure set in the far future, after a war with deadly machines has wiped out the human race. A sentient ragdoll comes into existence in this nightmarish world, and urges a group of similar creatures to rise up against their mechanical enemies. With the voices of Elijah Wood, Christopher Plummer and Martin Landau

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: Dimwitted Rhode Island limousine driver Lloyd Christmas and his equally vacuous friend Harry Dunne embark on a disaster-fraught cross-country trip to Aspen, where they hope to reunite a briefcase with its female owner. However, the pair are unaware the case contains a $1million ransom they would have been better leaving well alone. Farrelly brothers comedy, starring Jim Carrey, Jeff Daniels, Lauren Holly, Teri Garr and Mike Starr

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Dim-witted friends Harry and Lloyd are reunited after 20 years. When Harry discovers he has a daughter he never knew about, he breaks his friend out of a psychiatric hospital and they go on a road trip with the intention of fulfilling parental responsibilities neither of them is capable of. Comedy sequel, starring Jim Carrey and Jeff Daniels

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Bumbling scientist Sherman Klump is engaged to be married and determined to rid himself of his troublesome alter ego Buddy Love for ever. All his problems look set to be solved by his fiancees latest DNA experiment - but things are about to spiral out of control. Comedy sequel, starring Eddie Murphy in multiple roles, along with Janet Jackson and Larry Miller

programme.title: Yesterday
programme.desc: Jack, a struggling musician, gets hit by a bus during a mysterious event. When he regains consciousness, he finds that he is the only person who can remember the Beatles, and sets out to exploit the opportunity by passing their hits off as his own compositions. Danny Boyles comedy, starring Himesh Patel and Lily James

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A journalist desperate to be posted to a war zone encounters a special forces agent, who claims to have been part of a top-secret project to endow soldiers with superhuman powers. As the reporter joins the supposed psychic on a journey across Iraq, he discovers the bizarre story behind the experiment. Satirical comedy, starring George Clooney, Ewan McGregor, Jeff Bridges and Kevin Spacey

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: An ordinary man has a vision that the end of the world is coming. A series of inexplicable natural disasters confirms that the apocalypse is indeed at hand, and he leads a band of misfits on a perilous journey across their city in search of the means to save Earth. Spoof comedy, starring Matt Lanter and Vanessa Minnillo

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: A portly Mexican friar working as a cook in an orphanage adopts the guise of a masked wrestler. He teams up with a thief and enters a tournament hoping to win enough money to sort out the monasterys financial problems, feed the kids under his care and impress the nun he is in love with. Comedy, starring Jack Black and Ana de la Reguera

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: Dimwitted Rhode Island limousine driver Lloyd Christmas and his equally vacuous friend Harry Dunne embark on a disaster-fraught cross-country trip to Aspen, where they hope to reunite a briefcase with its female owner. However, the pair are unaware the case contains a $1million ransom they would have been better leaving well alone. Farrelly brothers comedy, starring Jim Carrey, Jeff Daniels, Lauren Holly, Teri Garr and Mike Starr

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Dim-witted friends Harry and Lloyd are reunited after 20 years. When Harry discovers he has a daughter he never knew about, he breaks his friend out of a psychiatric hospital and they go on a road trip with the intention of fulfilling parental responsibilities neither of them is capable of. Comedy sequel, starring Jim Carrey and Jeff Daniels

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs the World
programme.desc: A directionless bassist meets the girl of his dreams, but finds that romancing her comes with a dangerous catch. She has seven evil ex-lovers, all endowed with tremendous fighting skills or superpowers - and before he can go out with her, he is expected to face each one in a battle to the death. Comedy adventure, starring Michael Cera, Mary Elizabeth Winstead and Jason Schwartzman

programme.title: Its Complicated
programme.desc: Divorced couple Jane and Jake are reunited at their sons college graduation after 10 years apart, and end up sleeping together. Despite Jakes marriage to a younger woman and Janes fledgling romance with a kindly architect, the pair end up having a clandestine affair. Romantic comedy, starring Meryl Streep, Alec Baldwin and Steve Martin

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: A power-crazed bully, a sleazy cocaine addict and a sexual predator each make an employees life a misery, but the three workers cannot afford to quit their jobs. They resort to desperate measures by conspiring to murder each others bosses, with a little help from an eccentric ex-convict. Comedy, starring Jason Bateman, Charlie Day, Jason Sudeikis, Kevin Spacey, Jennifer Aniston and Colin Farrell

programme.title: Sixteen Candles
programme.desc: A teenagers parents forget her birthday, so she tries to get over her disappointment by searching for the man of her dreams, unaware shes looking in the wrong place. Comedy drama, starring Molly Ringwald, Justin Henry and Anthony Michael Hall

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: When New York University professor Rachel Chu heads to Singapore with her boyfriend, Nick Young, shes surprised to learn hes from an extremely wealthy family. The problem is they arent so approving of her, so she attempts to win them over. Blockbusting comedy based on Kevin Kwans novel, starring Constance Wu, Henry Golding, Gemma Chan and Michelle Yeoh

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: A veteran lifeguard commands a highly trained team that keeps the sun-kissed resort of Emerald Bay safe. As he breaks in some new recruits - including an insubordinate former Olympic swimmer - he has to contend with a dangerous new drug sweeping the beach. Action comedy based on the TV series, starring Dwayne Johnson, Zac Efron, Alexandra Daddario and Priyanka Chopra

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two hapless Americans get caught up in the machinations of the Mob, and are forced to deliver a cash-stuffed envelope to a mysterious Mr Smith in a far corner of Australia - but a wily kangaroo bounds off with the money, leaving the friends desperate to retrieve it before the gangsters catch up with them. Comedy, starring Jerry OConnell, Christopher Walken, Anthony Anderson and Estella Warren

programme.title: The Money Pit
programme.desc: Yuppie couple Walter and Anna buy a ramshackle old house and set about renovating it, only to see their dream home gradually turn into a nightmare. Anna also has to contend with her ex-husband, who is determined to talk her into giving their relationship another try. Comedy, starring Tom Hanks, Shelley Long, Alexander Godunov and Joe Mantegna

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: A portly Mexican friar working as a cook in an orphanage adopts the guise of a masked wrestler. He teams up with a thief and enters a tournament hoping to win enough money to sort out the monasterys financial problems, feed the kids under his care and impress the nun he is in love with. Comedy, starring Jack Black and Ana de la Reguera

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: A woman struggling to cope with a rebellious daughter and a marriage that has strayed into a rocky patch discovers a shocking family secret - her parents marriage is not legal. She decides to try and resolve the situation by getting the family to rally round and organise the most elaborate wedding imaginable. Romantic comedy sequel, starring Nia Vardalos and John Corbett

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: Anxious family man Gil Buckman is determined to have a better relationship with his three children than he had with his tough father. Elsewhere, his two sisters are also having family problems - one is struggling to understand her two troubled teenagers, while the others husband wants to turn their toddler into a child genius. Comedy drama, starring Steve Martin, Keanu Reeves, Mary Steenburgen, Jason Robards and Dianne Wiest

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: A former member of a singing trio, now running a hotel on a Greek island, is reunited with her old bandmates for her daughters wedding - but is surprised when three of her old flames also show up unexpectedly. The three men have been invited by the bride, who wants to find out which one of them is her father. Musical comedy, with a soundtrack of Abba songs, starring Meryl Streep, Pierce Brosnan, Julie Walters, Colin Firth, Stellan Skarsgard and Amanda Seyfried

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: Its five years since Sophie invited her three possible dads to her wedding, and now most of her family are reunited as she prepares for the grand reopening of the Hotel Bella Donna. Along the way, she learns more about her mothers past. Abba-themed musical sequel, starring Amanda Seyfried, Lily James, Pierce Brosnan, Cher and Andy Garcia

programme.title: Weird Science
programme.desc: Two sexually frustrated teenagers use their computer to design the perfect woman, but are ill prepared for the outcome when their creation comes to life. She decides to make men of them, by putting them in a series of situations that will force them to stand up for themselves. John Hughes sci-fi comedy, starring Kelly LeBrock, Anthony Michael Hall, Ilan Mitchell-Smith, Robert Downey Jr and Bill Paxton

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: An architect has a fling with a kooky waitress, who takes it upon herself to move into his house and pass herself off as his wife. When the woman he is actually in love with says she thinks the sham marriage is good for him, he decides to play along with the deception. Romantic comedy, starring Steve Martin, Goldie Hawn, Dana Delany, Donald Moffat and Julie Harris

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
programme.desc: Eric and fellow warrior Sara, raised as members of ice Queen Freyas army, try to conceal their forbidden love as they fight to survive the wicked intentions of both Freya and her sister Ravenna. However, as war between the siblings escalates, Eric and Sara unite with Freya in an attempt to end Ravennas wicked reign once and for all. Fantasy adventure, starring Chris Hemsworth, Charlize Theron, Emily Blunt and Jessica Chastain.

programme.title: Big Fat Liar
programme.desc: A 14-year-old with a reputation for tall tales loses the sole copy of a story he has written for school - only for it to end up in the hands of a Hollywood producer. When the youngster realises it has been made into a blockbuster movie, he goes to Los Angeles with his best friend to claim a fair share of the profits - but when the movie executive refuses to do the right thing, they plan a fitting revenge. Comedy, with Frankie Muniz, Paul Giamatti and Amanda Bynes

programme.title: A Tigers Journey
programme.desc: In the valleys of the Himalayas, an orphan boy saves a Bengal tiger cub from the poachers who killed the creatures mother. Together they head for a monastery in Bhutan known as the Tigers Nest, where Buddhist monks took refuge after the 1950 Chinese invasion of Tibet and protect the big cats. Drama, starring Sunny Pawar, Claudia Gerini and Amandeep Singh

programme.title: The BFG
programme.desc: An orphaned girl befriends a benevolent giant, who takes her off to a magical land, where they attempt to stop the man-eating creatures that are invading the human world. Steven Spielbergs fantasy adventure based on Roald Dahls book, starring Mark Rylance, Ruby Barnhill and Penelope Wilton

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: A private eye is recruited by a group of Buddhist mystics and sent on a mission to rescue an abducted boy whose supernatural powers will enable him to bring about world peace. However, the kidnapper is actually a demon in human form, determined to ensure the youngster does not fulfil his destiny. Comedy fantasy adventure, starring Eddie Murphy, Charles Dance and Charlotte Lewis

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Life for identical twins Jared and Simon and their sister Mallory begins afresh when their mother inherits a spooky mansion. But after moving in, strange things begin to happen, and as the youngsters investigate, they discover a book that opens up a mysterious world of amazing supernatural creatures. Fantasy adventure, starring Freddie Highmore in a dual role alongside Sarah Bolger and Nick Nolte

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Peter Pan, who has finally grown up and is now a married lawyer with a family of his own, is whisked away by Tinkerbell to Neverland, where he must learn to fly again if he is to save his children from the clutches of Captain Hook. Steven Spielbergs fantasy adventure, with Robin Williams, Dustin Hoffman, Julia Roberts, Bob Hoskins and Maggie Smith

programme.title: Cats and Dogs
programme.desc: In his quest for world domination, a power-mad Persian cat plots to sabotage a scientists plans to cure all humans who are allergic to dogs. A heroic puppy joins a force of canine secret agents to foil his schemes. Comedy, starring Jeff Goldblum and Elizabeth Perkins, and featuring the voices of Tobey Maguire, Alec Baldwin, Susan Sarandon and Sean Hayes

programme.title: A Tigers Journey
programme.desc: In the valleys of the Himalayas, an orphan boy saves a Bengal tiger cub from the poachers who killed the creatures mother. Together they head for a monastery in Bhutan known as the Tigers Nest, where Buddhist monks took refuge after the 1950 Chinese invasion of Tibet and protect the big cats. Drama, starring Sunny Pawar, Claudia Gerini and Amandeep Singh

programme.title: The Three Musketeers: Milady
programme.desc: DArtagnan faces a race against time to rescue his kidnapped sweetheart, the queens seamstress and confidante Constance. The young womans survival may rest with Milady, compelling DArtagnan to forge an uneasy alliance with his former enemy. Meanwhile, King Louis XIII faces the prospect of civil war, fuelled by conspirators within his royal court. Swashbuckling sequel, starring François Civil, Eva Green and Vincent Cassel

programme.title: Jackie Chans The Tuxedo
programme.desc: A bumbling chauffeur steps in to take the place of a secret agent injured in an explosion. Wearing the agents hi-tech suit, and with the help of a rookie spy, the humble driver now has all the power he needs to stop a villain from gaining global domination by polluting the worlds water supply. Comedy adventure, starring Jackie Chan, Jennifer Love Hewitt, Jason Isaacs and Richie Coster

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop 2
programme.desc: The bumbling security guard is invited to attend a conference in Las Vegas, and brings his teenage daughter along for a family holiday before she leaves for college. However, he is forced to leap into action when he uncovers a gang of criminals are plotting a casino heist. Comedy, starring Kevin James and Raini Rodriguez

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Peter Pan, who has finally grown up and is now a married lawyer with a family of his own, is whisked away by Tinkerbell to Neverland, where he must learn to fly again if he is to save his children from the clutches of Captain Hook. Steven Spielbergs fantasy adventure, with Robin Williams, Dustin Hoffman, Julia Roberts, Bob Hoskins and Maggie Smith

Comedy, starring Jeff Goldblum and Elizabeth Perkins, and featuring the voices of Tobey Maguire, Alec Baldwin, Susan Sarandon and Sean Hayes

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
programme.desc: The blue hedgehog, Knuckles and Tails reunite to face the might of the villainous Shadow, who possesses powers unlike anything they have seen before. Outmuscled on every front, Sonic seeks help from an unlikely source, Dr Ivo Robotnik. Fantasy adventure sequel based on the videogame, starring Jim Carrey, James Marsden and Tika Sumpter

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: A young shop assistant in Victorian England enters a magical parallel world in search of a fallen star to give to the girl of his dreams. However, the star in question is in fact a beautiful woman, who he helps flee from a wicked witch and a murderous prince. Fantasy adventure, based on Neil Gaimans novel, with Charlie Cox, Claire Danes, Michelle Pfeiffer, Robert De Niro, Mark Strong and Sienna Miller. Narrated by Ian McKellen

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: Green-skinned Elphaba Thropp becomes part of the new intake at Shiz University, and shares a room with fellow spell-caster Galinda Upland. Its the beginning of a friendship which culminates in an epic showdown as Elphaba transforms a renegade witch with a skill for bursting into show-stopping songs, like Defying Gravity. Part one of The Wizard of Oz prequel based on the hit stage musical, starring Cynthia Erivo, Ariana Grande-Butera, Jonathan Bailey, Michelle Yeoh and Jeff Goldblum

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop 2
programme.desc: The bumbling security guard is invited to attend a conference in Las Vegas, and brings his teenage daughter along for a family holiday before she leaves for college. However, he is forced to leap into action when he uncovers a gang of criminals are plotting a casino heist. Comedy, starring Kevin James and Raini Rodriguez

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Lao Luo is a washed-up stuntman with a deformed horse called Red Hare, who he saved from euthanasia. The duo become overnight sensations when a fight with debt collectors goes viral. Writer/director Larry Yangs action drama, starring Jackie Chan, Liu Haocun and Kevin Guo. In Mandarin, with subtitles

programme.title: The Wiz
programme.desc: Musical based on The Wizard of Oz, featuring an all-black cast. Dorothy is suddenly whisked off to a magical land and makes some unusual friends as she tries to get back home, while avoiding the malevolent attentions of a wicked witch. Directed by Sidney Lumet, starring Diana Ross, Michael Jackson and Richard Pryor

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: A wealthy playboy inherits a media empire when his father dies. Determined to do some good for a change, he uses his new-found fortune to become a masked crime-fighter. Aided by his chauffeur, who is a kung fu expert and a technical genius, he fights to bring down a powerful gangster. Comic-book adventure, starring Seth Rogen, Jay Chou, Cameron Diaz and Christoph Waltz

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: In a world dominated by deadly robots, resistance leader John Connor fights to stop the creation of an advanced new terminator, and searches for the teenager destined to go back in time and become his father. Elsewhere, a mysterious stranger with no memory is about to learn the shocking truth about his origins. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Christian Bale, Sam Worthington and Anton Yelchin

programme.title: The Nun
programme.desc: A troubled priest and a novice nun discover a religious orders terrible secret and battle a malevolent force while investigating the apparent suicide of a Romanian nun. Fifth instalment in The Conjuring Universe horror saga, starring Taissa Farmiga and Demián Bichir

Leonidas, fearless king of Sparta, leads 300 of his finest warriors into battle against the vast invading armies of the ruler of the Persian empire. As the outnumbered Spartans fight for their country, his queen, Gorgo, tries to rally support for her husband at home. Fantasy action adventure based on Frank Miller and Lynn Varleys comic-book series, starring Gerard Butler, Lena Headey, Dominic West, David Wenham and Rodrigo Santoro

programme.title: Gladiator II
programme.desc: After losing his home, Lucius, the son of a slain Roman General, is forced to enter the Colosseum in an attempt to bring glory back to Rome. Ridley Scotts historical drama sequel, starring Paul Mescal, Pedro Pascal and Denzel Washington, with Connie Nielsen and Derek Jacobi reprising their roles from the first film

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A former army sniper is arrested following a random shooting that leaves five people dead, but protests his innocence. An elusive former military police investigator is called in to examine the case, and becomes convinced a conspiracy is at work. Action thriller based on Lee Childs novel One Shot, starring Tom Cruise, Rosamund Pike, Werner Herzog and Robert Duvall

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: The nomadic vigilante tries to save an army major who has been framed for murder and treason. Jack Reacher discovers that Turner has been targeted by a secret government conspiracy, and together they go on the run to expose the truth. Director Edward Zwicks blockbusting action thriller sequel based on Lee Childs novel, starring Tom Cruise, Cobie Smulders, Danika Yarosh and Aldis Hodge

programme.title: Blade
programme.desc: A half-vampire possesses all the strengths inherent in bloodsuckers with none of their weaknesses, and is determined to wipe the monsters from the face of the Earth. However, he faces a deadly new threat in a renegade vampire who is close to decoding an ancient prophecy that will allow him to repopulate the world with his kind. Action thriller, starring Wesley Snipes, Stephen Dorff and Kris Kristofferson

programme.title: Aeon Flux
programme.desc: Scientists create a futuristic police state, but political assassinations and corruption provoke an acrobatic rebel agent to seek revenge on those in charge. Sci-fi martial arts thriller, based on the animated series, with Charlize Theron, Marton Csokas, Frances McDormand, Jonny Lee Miller and Sophie Okonedo

programme.title: Oldboy
programme.desc: A man is abducted and locked away in a small room for 15 years then suddenly set free, with no explanation for why he was incarcerated. Bewildered and disorientated, he struggles to adapt to his new-found freedom, but vows to find out what has become of his family and who his captors were so he can mete out his own brand of revenge. Thriller, directed by Park Chan-wook, starring Choi Min-sik, Gang Hye-jung and Yu Ji-tae. In Korean

programme.title: Dorian Gray
programme.desc: A naive Victorian man unthinkingly sells his soul for eternal youth, wishing that a portrait of him should age instead. His wish is granted and he is drawn into a life of debauchery by a hedonistic lord, while over the years, the painting becomes increasingly horrific as it reflects his corrupt true nature. Horror, based on Oscar Wildes novel, starring Ben Barnes, Colin Firth and Ben Chaplin

programme.title: Cleaner
programme.desc: Environmental activists hijack an energy companys gala in Canary Wharf and take 300 hostages and an ex-soldier now working as a window cleaner tries to rescue them. Action thriller, starring Daisy Ridley. Action thriller, starring Daisy Ridley and Clive Owen

programme.title: The Watched
programme.desc: Mina, a 28-year old artist, gets stranded in an expansive, untouched forest in western Ireland. When Mina finds shelter, she unknowingly becomes trapped alongside three strangers that are stalked by mysterious creatures each night. Horror, starring Dakota Fanning, Georgina Campbell and Olwen Fouere

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A former army sniper is arrested following a random shooting that leaves five people dead, but protests his innocence. An elusive former military police investigator is called in to examine the case, and becomes convinced a conspiracy is at work. Action thriller based on Lee Childs novel One Shot, starring Tom Cruise, Rosamund Pike, Werner Herzog and Robert Duvall

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: The nomadic vigilante tries to save an army major who has been framed for murder and treason. Jack Reacher discovers that Turner has been targeted by a secret government conspiracy, and together they go on the run to expose the truth. Director Edward Zwicks blockbusting action thriller sequel based on Lee Childs novel, starring Tom Cruise, Cobie Smulders, Danika Yarosh and Aldis Hodge

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: The laid-back lifestyle of an arrogant New York playboy is shattered when his unstable girlfriend drives off a bridge with him in the car. Although he survives, he struggles to put his life back together in the face of a series of strange events. Cameron Crowes remake of Spanish thriller Open Your Eyes, starring Tom Cruise, Cameron Diaz, Kurt Russell, Jason Lee and Penelope Cruz, who also appeared in the original

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: In the months leading up to the Second World War, a young London stockbroker attempts to rescue hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from Nazi-occupied Czechoslovakia. Fifty years later he comes to terms with the guilt and grief he carried with him for decades. Drama based on a true story, starring Anthony Hopkins, Lena Olin and Johnny Flynn

programme.title: It Ends With Us
programme.desc: Lily Bloom returns to her childhood home of Plethora, Maine, to attend the funeral of her father, the former town mayor who beat his wife behind closed doors. Upon returning to Boston, Lily is attracted to Ryle Kincaid, a neurosurgeon with a dark side, and old flame Atlas Corrigan. Drama based on the bestselling novel, starring Blake Lively, Justin Baldoni, Jenny Slate and Brandon Sklenar

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: Two female jailbirds imprisoned for murder pull out all the stops to seize the attention of the media. Aided by a slick lawyer, both women are desperate to find fame and fortune and escape the death penalty by winning public sympathy. Musical, starring Renee Zellweger, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Richard Gere, John C Reilly and Queen Latifah

programme.title: Borat Subsequent Moviefilm
programme.desc: Borat returns from Kazakhstan to America intent on giving his fifteen year old daughter to the vice president. While on his mission, Borat also learns more about the American culture, the COVID-19 pandemic and political elections. Spoof documentary sequel, starring Sacha Baron Cohen

programme.title: The Quiet Man
programme.desc: An American prizefighter retires after killing an opponent in the ring, and returns to his Irish roots in a village in Galway, where he falls for a local woman. Unfortunately, their romance is hampered by a conflict with her brother over a property matter. John Fords Oscar-winning romantic comedy drama, starring John Wayne, Maureen OHara, Victor McLaglen, Barry Fitzgerald and Ward Bond

programme.title: Jackie Chans The Tuxedo
programme.desc: A bumbling chauffeur steps in to take the place of a secret agent injured in an explosion. Wearing the agents hi-tech suit, and with the help of a rookie spy, the humble driver now has all the power he needs to stop a villain from gaining global domination by polluting the worlds water supply. Comedy adventure, starring Jackie Chan, Jennifer Love Hewitt, Jason Isaacs and Richie Coster

programme.title: Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: After a whirlwind night of romance with a terminally ill man, a woman commits to helping him spend his last days living life to the fullest. Drama, starring Isabelle Fuhrman, Mena Massoud, Jennifer Grey and Kelsey Grammer. Co-written, produced and directed by Julia Stiles

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: An estate agent is pulled back into the life he left behind after his former partner-in-crime resurfaces with an ominous message. Action comedy, starring Ke Huy Quan, Ariana DeBose, Mustafa Shakir and Lio Tipton

programme.title: Spin the Bottle
programme.desc: When a group of friends play spin the bottle in a house marked by a brutal massacre, they unknowingly unleash an evil spirit and start dying in terrifying ways. The survivors must stick together to uncover the houses secrets and end the bloodshed. Horror starring Tanner Stine and Kaylee Kaneshiro

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: In 1838 Germany, Thomas Hutter is sent to the Carpathian mountains to secure the signature of enigmatic nobleman Count Orlok on a property sale in the German city of Wisborg. Thomas leaves his bride Ellen in the care of friend Friedrich Harding and his wife Anna. The young man barely survives the exhausting trip to Europe and stumbles home to find Ellen driven to delirium by a telepathic bond to the Count. Director Robert Eggers version of the Dracula-inspired horror, starring Bill Skarsgard, Lily-Rose Depp, Nicholas Hoult and Aaron Taylor-Johnson

programme.title: Wolf Man
programme.desc: After a family barricade themselves inside their remote farmhouse when a creature attacks, a father slowly transforms into something unrecognisable. Werewolf horror from The Invisible Man director Leigh Whannell, starring Christopher Abbott, Julia Garner, Matilda Firth and Sam Jaeger

programme.title: Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: After a whirlwind night of romance with a terminally ill man, a woman commits to helping him spend his last days living life to the fullest. Drama, starring Isabelle Fuhrman, Mena Massoud, Jennifer Grey and Kelsey Grammer. Co-written, produced and directed by Julia Stiles

Werewolf horror from The Invisible Man director Leigh Whannell, starring Christopher Abbott, Julia Garner, Matilda Firth and Sam Jaeger

programme.title: The Brutalist
programme.desc: When a couple flee Europe in 1947, their new lives in the US are changed by a strange client. Director Brady Corbets drama, starring Adrien Brody, Felicity Jones, Guy Pearce and Joe Alwyn

programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young couple flee the city during a zombie outbreak, only to be involved in a car crash. When the man awakes, his girlfriend is missing, so he bands together with a rugged survivalist to find his partner - but he only has selected memories of what he has been through. Apocalypse drama, starring Carrie-Anne Moss, Douglas Smith, Frank Grillo and Kimberley-Sue Murray

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: An estate agent is pulled back into the life he left behind after his former partner-in-crime resurfaces with an ominous message. Action comedy, starring Ke Huy Quan, Ariana DeBose, Mustafa Shakir and Lio Tipton

Werewolf horror from The Invisible Man director Leigh Whannell, starring Christopher Abbott, Julia Garner, Matilda Firth and Sam Jaeger

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim
programme.desc: Helm Hammerhand sits on the throne of Rohan, flanked by sons Hama and Haleth and rebellious daughter Hera. Dunlending lord Freca proposes a marital union between Hera and his son Wulf, which Helm loudly rejects. In a subsequent brawl between fathers, Helm unintentionally lands a fatal blow, so Wulf vows revenge and amasses an army led by General Targg. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Gaia Wise, Brian Cox, Luke Pasqualino and Lorraine Ashbourne

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: An estate agent is pulled back into the life he left behind after his former partner-in-crime resurfaces with an ominous message. Action comedy, starring Ke Huy Quan, Ariana DeBose, Mustafa Shakir and Lio Tipton

programme.title: One of Them Days
programme.desc: When best friends and roommates Dreux and Alyssa discover the latters boyfriend has blown their rent money, the duo faces a race against time to avoid eviction. Comedy, starring Keke Palmer and SZA

programme.title: Wolf Man
programme.desc: After a family barricade themselves inside their remote farmhouse when a creature attacks, a father slowly transforms into something unrecognisable. Werewolf horror from The Invisible Man director Leigh Whannell, starring Christopher Abbott, Julia Garner, Matilda Firth and Sam Jaeger

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: In 1838 Germany, Thomas Hutter is sent to the Carpathian mountains to secure the signature of enigmatic nobleman Count Orlok on a property sale in the German city of Wisborg. Thomas leaves his bride Ellen in the care of friend Friedrich Harding and his wife Anna. The young man barely survives the exhausting trip to Europe and stumbles home to find Ellen driven to delirium by a telepathic bond to the Count. Director Robert Eggers version of the Dracula-inspired horror, starring Bill Skarsgard, Lily-Rose Depp, Nicholas Hoult and Aaron Taylor-Johnson

programme.title: The Brutalist
programme.desc: When a couple flee Europe in 1947, their new lives in the US are changed by a strange client. Director Brady Corbets drama, starring Adrien Brody, Felicity Jones, Guy Pearce and Joe Alwyn

programme.title: The Prosecutor
programme.desc: An ex-prosecutor investigates when a man falsely pleads guilty to drug trafficking after being framed, uncovering a corrupt lawyers scheme and fighting to restore justice - despite obstruction from evil forces. Action thriller, starring Donnie Yen, Julian Cheung and Francis Ng. In Cantonese

programme.title: Slingshot
programme.desc: An astronaut attempts to stay sane while on a troubled mission to Saturns moon, Titan. Director Mikael Hafstroms sci-fi thriller, starring Casey Affleck, Laurence Fishburne, Emily Beecham and David Morrissey

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: A journalist investigates several teenage deaths, which are linked to a cursed videotape and the rumour that anyone who watches it will die a week later. Her growing obsession with the tape endangers herself and her family - and to avoid the predicted fate, she has just seven days to find out where the recording came from. Gore Verbinskis remake of the Japanese supernatural horror, starring Naomi Watts, Martin Henderson and Brian Cox

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: Maverick film-maker Carl Denham and his cast and crew board a ship bound for a mysterious island - but when they arrive, a giant gorilla carries off their leading lady, Ann Darrow. As the crew makes its way through the teeming jungle to find her, the director concocts a dangerous scheme to capture the great ape and take it back to New York. Peter Jacksons remake of the fantasy adventure, starring Naomi Watts, Jack Black, Adrien Brody and Andy Serkis, in a dual role as the ships cook and motion-captured creature

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: A streetwise cop is enlisted by a top-secret government force dedicated to policing alien visitors to Earth, teaming up with a veteran agent just as a body-swapping extraterrestrial giant insect begins a reign of terror throughout New York City. Sci-fi comedy, starring Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, Linda Fiorentino, Rip Torn and Vincent DOnofrio

programme.title: Edge of Tomorrow
programme.desc: An inexperienced military officer is sent to the front line in a war against an alien invasion, and dies within minutes. However, at the point of death, he is transported back in time to relive his last day again. As he faces the same battle over and over again, the experience he gains turns him into the ultimate warrior. Sci-fi adventure based on Hiroshi Sakurazakas novel All You Need Is Kill, starring Tom Cruise, Emily Blunt and Brendan Gleeson

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Agent J investigates the unauthorised landing of a spacecraft and discovers a malevolent alien disguised as a lingerie model is on the verge of destroying humanity. His only hope of stopping her diabolical plot is to restore the memory of his retired partner K - but his former mentor takes more than a little convincing. Sci-fi comedy sequel, directed by Barry Sonnenfeld, starring Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, Rosario Dawson, Lara Flynn Boyle, Johnny Knoxville, Rip Torn and Tony Shalhoub

programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.desc: On the desert planet Arrakis, freedom fighters Paul and Chani galvanise the Fremen to strike down murderous conspirators against the Atreides dynasty. Sci-fi drama based on Frank Herberts acclaimed novel, starring Timothee Chalamet, Zendaya, Austin Butler and Rebecca Ferguson

programme.title: Videodrome
programme.desc: A sleazy TV producer investigates a violent pirate broadcast that may be a real snuff movie. In the process, he uncovers a sinister plot to turn the public into brainless drones through their televisions. David Cronenbergs surreal horror, starring James Woods, Sonja Smits, Deborah Harry and Peter Dvorsky

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: A brilliant scientist tests an invisibility serum on himself, but becomes dangerously intoxicated by the power he acquires. He abandons his morals and heads out into the city to take full advantage of his condition. Realising he has been up to no good, concerned colleagues decide to confront him - with terrible consequences. Paul Verhoevens sci-fi thriller, starring Kevin Bacon, Elisabeth Shue, Josh Brolin and Kim Dickens

programme.title: Monolith
programme.desc: A disgraced journalist attempts to save her career by turning to investigative podcasting. She soon starts to wonder if a strange artefact is linked to an alien conspiracy, or whether she is losing her mind. Director Matt Veselys thriller, starring Lily Sullivan

programme.title: The Pact
programme.desc: A woman reluctantly returns to her family home to support her sister after their mothers death, but finds she has vanished without trace. A series of strange events leaves her convinced there is an evil presence haunting the house, and she tries to find out what it is and what it has done with her sister. Horror, starring Caity Lotz and Casper Van Dien

programme.title: The Cinema List: Horror Villains
programme.desc: This Halloween, face terror in every form: from the haunted halls of The Shining to the unseen menace of The Invisible Man, this collection delivers horror at its finest

programme.title: Night Swim
programme.desc: Forced into early retirement by a degenerative illness, former baseball player Ray Waller moves into a new house with his wife and two children. He hopes that the backyard swimming pool will be fun for the kids and provide physical therapy for himself. However, a dark secret from the homes past soon unleashes a malevolent force that drags the family into the depths of inescapable terror. Writer/director Bryce McGuires horror, starring Wyatt Russell and Kerry Condon

programme.title: Edge of Tomorrow
programme.desc: An inexperienced military officer is sent to the front line in a war against an alien invasion, and dies within minutes. However, at the point of death, he is transported back in time to relive his last day again. As he faces the same battle over and over again, the experience he gains turns him into the ultimate warrior. Sci-fi adventure based on Hiroshi Sakurazakas novel All You Need Is Kill, starring Tom Cruise, Emily Blunt and Brendan Gleeson

programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.desc: On the desert planet Arrakis, freedom fighters Paul and Chani galvanise the Fremen to strike down murderous conspirators against the Atreides dynasty. Sci-fi drama based on Frank Herberts acclaimed novel, starring Timothee Chalamet, Zendaya, Austin Butler and Rebecca Ferguson

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Agent J investigates the unauthorised landing of a spacecraft and discovers a malevolent alien disguised as a lingerie model is on the verge of destroying humanity. His only hope of stopping her diabolical plot is to restore the memory of his retired partner K - but his former mentor takes more than a little convincing. Sci-fi comedy sequel, directed by Barry Sonnenfeld, starring Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, Rosario Dawson, Lara Flynn Boyle, Johnny Knoxville, Rip Torn and Tony Shalhoub

programme.title: The Crazies
programme.desc: The sheriff of a quiet little town investigates a series of unexpected murders, trying to work out what could have driven seemingly normal, well-adjusted people to kill. He discovers that a toxic chemical has turned many of the townsfolk into bloodthirsty maniacs, leaving those unaffected battling for survival. Horror remake, with Timothy Olyphant and Radha Mitchell

programme.title: Insidious
programme.desc: A family experience strange events in their house and become convinced it is haunted. However, after moving on, they find the dark forces have followed them and when their son mysteriously falls into a coma, they must find a way to get rid of the paranormal entities tormenting them. Horror, starring Patrick Wilson and Rose Byrne

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant planet malfunctions. As woken travelling companions Jim Preston and Aurora Lane fall in love, they are soon on a collision course with more technical problems and a dark secret. Sci-fi drama, starring Jennifer Lawrence, Chris Pratt and Michael Sheen

programme.title: Concrete Utopia
programme.desc: The world has been reduced to rubble by a massive earthquake, and in the heart of Seoul there is only one rsediential building left standing - Hwang Gung Apartments. Outsiders start coming to the flats, and feeling a threat to their survival, the residents enact a special measure. South Korean drama with subtitles, starring Lee Byung-hun and Park Seo-joon

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A teenager recovering from the suicide of a friend persuades a group of her classmates to join her in attempting to make contact with the dead girls spirit. They discover that she was driven to her death by dangerous supernatural forces, which they have unwittingly unleashed to prey on them. Horror, starring Olivia Cooke and Ana Coto

programme.title: Strange Darling
programme.desc: A twisted one-night stand devolves into a serial killers vicious killing spree and a cat-and-mouse chase. Writer/director JT Mollners thriller, starring Willa Fitzgerald, Kyle Gallner, Madisen Beaty and Barbara Hershey

programme.title: Night Swim
programme.desc: Forced into early retirement by a degenerative illness, former baseball player Ray Waller moves into a new house with his wife and two children. He hopes that the backyard swimming pool will be fun for the kids and provide physical therapy for himself. However, a dark secret from the homes past soon unleashes a malevolent force that drags the family into the depths of inescapable terror. Writer/director Bryce McGuires horror, starring Wyatt Russell and Kerry Condon

programme.title: A Place Called Silence
programme.desc: At a girls middle school plagued by bullying, a students tragic death leads to a wave of disappearances. Thriller, starring Eric Wang and Ning Chang. In Mandarin with English subtitles

programme.title: The Wasp
programme.desc: Estranged childhood friends Heather and Carla reunite for a cup of tea after not having spoken in many years. At their meeting, Heather presents an unexpected proposition that will change their lives forever. Director Guillem Morales thriller, starring Naomie Harris and Natalie Dormer

programme.title: Greedy People
programme.desc: A rookie cop is partnered with an unhinged and morally dubious local officer in a small island town. A murder and the discovery of a million dollars soon turns the local communitys lives upside down. Director Potsy Poncirolis comedy, starring Himesh Patel, Lily James and Joseph Gordon-Levitt

programme.title: Last Seen Alive
programme.desc: Will Spann is driving his soon-to-be ex-wife Lisa to her parents home when she mysteriously disappears without a trace during a stop at a gas station. A frantic Will engages the local police and Lisas parents in a desperate attempt to find her, but as time passes and suspicion falls on him, he must take matters into his own hands, delving into the towns criminal underbelly while running from the authorities in a race against time. Thriller, with Gerard Butler and Jaimie Alexander

programme.title: Layer Cake
programme.desc: A London cocaine dealer is all set to leave the criminal world behind and start a new life abroad. However, his plans are thwarted when he is asked to track down a gangsters drug-addicted daughter and locate a stolen shipment of Ecstasy. Crime thriller, starring Daniel Craig, Michael Gambon, Colm Meaney, Kenneth Cranham and Sienna Miller

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: The laid-back lifestyle of an arrogant New York playboy is shattered when his unstable girlfriend drives off a bridge with him in the car. Although he survives, he struggles to put his life back together in the face of a series of strange events. Cameron Crowes remake of Spanish thriller Open Your Eyes, starring Tom Cruise, Cameron Diaz, Kurt Russell, Jason Lee and Penelope Cruz, who also appeared in the original

programme.title: Maggie Moore(s)
programme.desc: Police Chief Sanders investigates the bizarre murders of two women with the same name and unravels a web of small-town lies. He soon falls for Rita, a nosy neighbour who is eager to help solve the mystery. Director John Slatterys comedy thriller, starring Jon Hamm, Nick Mohammed and Tina Fey

programme.title: The Equalizer
programme.desc: A retired secret agent applies his talents to the task of helping victims of injustice. When he witnesses a prostitute being beaten up by a pimp, he kills the man, an act that draws him into a battle to the death with a Russian crime syndicate. Action thriller based on the 1980s TV series, starring Denzel Washington and Chloe Grace Moretz

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Three brothers run an underground bootlegging operation in Depression-era Virginia. However, as their criminal activities become increasingly successful, a corrupt deputy sheriff demands a cut of the profits, forcing them to fight to defend their livelihood. Crime drama, starring Shia LaBeouf, Tom Hardy, Jason Clarke, Gary Oldman and Guy Pearce

programme.title: Patriot Games
programme.desc: Former CIA agent Jack Ryan foils an assassination attempt by an IRA splinter group, killing one of the terrorists in the process. However, he becomes caught in a lethal game of cat-and-mouse with the dead mans revenge-seeking brother. Thriller based on Tom Clancys novel, starring Harrison Ford, Sean Bean, Samuel L Jackson, Richard Harris and James Earl Jones, reprising his role from earlier Clancy adaptation The Hunt for Red October

programme.title: The Wasp
programme.desc: Estranged childhood friends Heather and Carla reunite for a cup of tea after not having spoken in many years. At their meeting, Heather presents an unexpected proposition that will change their lives forever. Director Guillem Morales thriller, starring Naomie Harris and Natalie Dormer

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: A woman on the run after stealing from her boss stops off at an isolated motel, where the disturbed owners curious relationship with his domineering mother leads to murder. Director Gus Van Sants scene-by-scene remake of Alfred Hitchcocks thriller, starring Vince Vaughn, Anne Heche, Julianne Moore, Viggo Mortensen and William H Macy.

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: The laid-back lifestyle of an arrogant New York playboy is shattered when his unstable girlfriend drives off a bridge with him in the car. Although he survives, he struggles to put his life back together in the face of a series of strange events. Cameron Crowes remake of Spanish thriller Open Your Eyes, starring Tom Cruise, Cameron Diaz, Kurt Russell, Jason Lee and Penelope Cruz, who also appeared in the original

programme.title: Juror #2
programme.desc: Magazine writer and family man Justin Kemp is sequestered to serve on the trial of James Sythe, who is accused of killing his girlfriend Kendall one year ago, following a fight in a bar. Justin faces an agonising moral dilemma - he was at the same pub as the defendant that fateful night, and struck something on the road during the drive home, which might have been Kendall. Clint Eastwoods legal thriller, starring Nicholas Hoult, Toni Collette, JK Simmons and Kiefer Sutherland

programme.title: The Equalizer
programme.desc: A retired secret agent applies his talents to the task of helping victims of injustice. When he witnesses a prostitute being beaten up by a pimp, he kills the man, an act that draws him into a battle to the death with a Russian crime syndicate. Action thriller based on the 1980s TV series, starring Denzel Washington and Chloe Grace Moretz

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A respected academic goes on the run when he is framed for the murder of a French historian. Pursued by the detective on the case and a sinister assassin monk, he strives to unmask the culprit, leading to a conspiracy determined to preserve a 2,000-year-old secret at any cost. Thriller based on Dan Browns novel, starring Tom Hanks, Audrey Tautou, Ian McKellen, Paul Bettany and Jean Reno

programme.title: Angels and Demons
programme.desc: Academic adventurer Robert Langdon is called in by the Vatican to deal with a crisis. Pope Pius XVI has died suddenly and the four cardinals in line to be his successor have all been abducted by a mysterious sect that is threatening to murder them. As he searches for the kidnapped clerics, Langdon discovers the cult has an even more horrific plan in mind involving a stolen canister of anti-matter. Ron Howard takes the reins once again for the sequel to The Da Vinci Code, with Tom Hanks, Ewan McGregor, Ayelet Zurer, Stellan Skarsgard and Pierfrancesco Favino

programme.title: The Day of the Jackal
programme.desc: A group of conspirators contracts the Jackal, a professional hitman, to assassinate President Charles de Gaulle of France. The killer starts to put his painstaking plans into action, creating a new identity, establishing his alibi and commissioning a custom-made weapon, while out-foxing the French police at every turn. Fred Zinnemanns adaptation of Fredericks Forsyth thriller, with Edward Fox, Michael Lonsdale, Alan Badel, Tony Britton and Cyril Cusack

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A man is forced to witness the murder of his wife and daughter, and is driven to despair when one of the perpetrators walks free at trial. Years later, he begins a campaign of vigilante violence, seeking revenge on the killers and the justice system that failed to punish them, particularly an assistant district attorney who allowed the defendant to make a deal during the court proceedings. Thriller, with Gerard Butler and Jamie Foxx

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: A woman on the run after stealing from her boss stops off at an isolated motel, where the disturbed owners curious relationship with his domineering mother leads to murder. Director Gus Van Sants scene-by-scene remake of Alfred Hitchcocks thriller, starring Vince Vaughn, Anne Heche, Julianne Moore, Viggo Mortensen and William H Macy.

programme.title: Juror #2
programme.desc: Magazine writer and family man Justin Kemp is sequestered to serve on the trial of James Sythe, who is accused of killing his girlfriend Kendall one year ago, following a fight in a bar. Justin faces an agonising moral dilemma - he was at the same pub as the defendant that fateful night, and struck something on the road during the drive home, which might have been Kendall. Clint Eastwoods legal thriller, starring Nicholas Hoult, Toni Collette, JK Simmons and Kiefer Sutherland

programme.desc: Hannah develops an overwhelming fear of Aids after watching Forrest Gump, and when she discovers Adam has been having unprotected sex she decides to go for an STD test. programme.desc: Hannah starts a job at a law firm, where her new boss Rich is a bit too friendly - but her colleagues assure her the perks of the job make a little sexual harassment worth enduring. Armando Iannuccis American political satire, starring Julia Louis-Dreyfus

programme.desc: The return of Armando Iannuccis satire starring Julia Louis-Dreyfus as US vice-president Selina Meyer. programme.desc: Larry helps Jeff comfort his familys ailing dog by picking up its favourite food. He also hopes to lie his way out of attending a charity event - but his fake alibi spirals dangerously out of control. With Michael McKean, Michael Hitchcock and Rich Sommer

Guest starring Ruthie Henshall, Samantha Mathis and Chris Parnell

programme.title: Britains Most Historic Towns
programme.desc: Alice Roberts explores the Georgian era in her home city of Bristol. She takes a horse-drawn carriage ride to explore Cliftons Georgian architecture, samples some of the backstreet gin that was considered a threat to civilisation, and discovers the ingenious story behind the worlds first chocolate factory. She also delves into the citys links with the slave trade, uncovering horrific tales in the historical records. Plus, aerial archaeologist Ben Robinson provides a birds-eye view of how 18th-century wealth transformed the city

programme.title: Britains Most Historic Towns
programme.desc: Alice Roberts explores Cardiffs Edwardian past, discovering how the coal industry transformed the Rhondda Valley in the early 1900s. She investigates the difficult and often dangerous work of the miners, and visits the trading floor where the first ever million pound cheque was signed. The programme also investigates how global shipping routes and plentiful employment brought immigrants from across the world to Wales, and meets descendants of people who came to the city in the early years of the 20th century

programme.desc: Rush suspects a tracking device has been planted on the Destiny, and a group of dissidents stages a coup with life-threatening consequences. Sci-fi drama, starring Robert Carlyle and Justin Louis

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School
programme.desc: The team races to contain a case of malaria brought in by orphaned infant Cesia, before assessing surrogate mum Sris plan to help Bumi

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart angrily breaks Lisas treasured saxophone during a petty squabble, prompting Homer and Marge to recall how she acquired it in the first place. Guest starring the voice of Fyvush Finkel

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer buys a handgun to protect his family, but begins using it to perform all kinds of household tasks - prompting Marge and the kids to leave home and move into a sleazy motel

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: Maxs attempt to woo Sabrina at the bank is scuppered by a pair of armed robbers, while Danno tries to protect a Victorias Secret model who has been threatened by a stalker. American crime drama, starring Alex OLoughlin and Scott Caan, with guest stars Behati Prinsloo and Rumer Willis

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: McGarretts camping trip with Grace and her fellow Aloha Girls takes a turn for the worse when an armed man searching for a package stumbles across them in the jungle, taking the detective and a young child hostage before locking everyone else in a storage shed. Meanwhile, Adam introduces Kono to his brother Michael - who has just completed a prison sentence for manslaughter - but despite his claims that he is now a reformed character, Kono is far from convinced. Drama, guest starring Tom Arnold, with Alex OLoughlin and Scott Caan

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: Thomas and Higgins try to help Kumus friend Zhao recover her life savings, which were lost to a scammer, while TC becomes increasingly frustrated at the lack of progress in his recovery and pushes everyone away

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: After the shooting of a member of 20-Squad, Hondo and the team launch a citywide manhunt for the crew responsible. Meanwhile, Deacons plans for his future hit a snag, and Powell and Alfaro clash over a tricky issue.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge takes a job as an estate agent, but her honesty with potential buyers costs her lucrative sales and gets her into hot water with the boss, who issues an ultimatum. The Flanders agree to buy one of the agencys houses - unaware of the propertys gruesome past

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge suffers a nervous breakdown and has to be packed off for a well-earned rest, leaving Lisa and Bart with Patty and Selma, and Homer alone with Maggie

programme.title: The Office (US)
programme.desc: Michael and Darryl send Dunder Mifflin HQ a deputation demanding an increase in salary. Pams confession to Roy creates a problem for Jim. US remake of the sitcom set in a paper supply company, starring Steve Carell

programme.title: The Office (US)
programme.desc: The staff take part in a safety training day, and Michael and Dwight join forces to highlight the potential hazards present in the workplace. After weeks of anger management therapy, Andy returns to the office hoping to make a fresh start with his colleagues. Comedy, with Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson and David Wallace

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart has his ear pierced, while Homer is fired from the nuclear power plant and finds a new job - as the captain of a submarine in the US Navy. Featuring the guest voices of Rod Steiger and Bob Denver

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: As Principal Skinner prepares to enjoy a ceremony celebrating his 20th year as head of Springfield Elementary, a stranger exposes him as a former street punk who stole his identity. Featuring the guest voice of Martin Sheen

programme.title: Whale with Steve Backshall
programme.desc: Steve returns home and travels around the British Isles to follow stories of survival and meet the people striving to give whales and dolphins a safe future

programme.title: Big Little Lies
programme.desc: Madeline gets under Renatas skin in retaliation for snubbing Ziggy, while Celeste and Perry see a counsellor, and Jane opens up about her past

programme.title: Big Little Lies
programme.desc: Nathan invites Madeline to a dinner to discuss Abigail, and Celeste angers Perry by lending her legal skills to get the play back on track

programme.title: Retribution
programme.desc: While driving his kids to school, Matt Turner, a Berlin-based American businessman, learns that his vehicle is rigged with explosives. Director Nimrod Antals thriller, starring Liam Neeson, Noma Dumezweni and Jack Champion

programme.title: An Idiot Abroad
programme.desc: Karl Pilkington travels to Africa to spend time with rare mountain gorillas, and does charity work and caravan-based exploring along the way. He also prepares a meal for a tribal king, encounters a rhinoceros and discovers a hippopotamus that lives in a house. Karl finally arrives in Uganda to see the gorillas after a 12-hour drive, but is not pleased by the ensuing 10-hour jungle trek

programme.title: Road Wars
programme.desc: Rowdy tourists cause problems in Reading, a routine stop gets out of hand for police in Slough, and an officer has a lucky escape after being involved in a head-on collision. Plus, footage of a pursuit involving six patrol cars, a helicopter and three stingers

programme.title: Ryder Cup Memories
programme.desc: Luke Donald shares his memories of the remarkable 2012 Ryder Cup in Medinah, where the European team made a staggering comeback to win on the final day. programme.title: Iniúchadh TG4
programme.desc: Kevin Magee investigates the reasons why the number of students being given exemptions from studying Irish at school is on the rise. He travels around Ireland to meet educators, students, academics, teachers and those who have received exemptions to uncover the factors driving this spike. Is the increase rooted in genuine need, or are some trying to exploit the system? Irish language advocates warn that rising exemption rates are a gateway to Irish becoming optional as a school subject, while others say the need for them has never been greater

programme.sub-title: Mícheál Ó Coileáin and Kitty Kiernan
programme.desc: The tragic love story of Michael Collins and Kitty Kiernan, who kept their love alive through the 300 letters they exchanged between 1919 and 1922. programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson gets to grips with a Peel P50, the smallest car to go into production, and finds a surprising number of uses for it. James May experiences the luxury of the Rolls-Royce Phantom Drophead Coupe convertible, and the Stig puts the Ferrari 599 GTB Fiorano through its paces on the test track. The Rolling Stones Ronnie Wood is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car

programme.title: Rick Steins Spain
programme.desc: The chef embarks on a culinary tour of the country, laced with history, literature and stunning photography. Driving a clapped-out old VW camper van around the Galicia region on the Atlantic coast, Rick discovers places off the beaten track as he samples classic dishes of rural Spain, a country he believes has been underrated in cookery circles until quite recently

programme.title: Hairy Bikers Best of British

programme.title: Would I Lie to You?

programme.desc: Midwife Linda Abbott comes out of retirement to return to Leeds General Infirmary, while two fathers with very different attitudes await the arrival of their newborns. Meanwhile, Chris admits he doesnt have a clue what to do in his role as birth partner, and his attempt to use humour to deal with his nerves fails to go down well in the delivery room

programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz in which contestants answer questions to win turns on an arcade-style machine. programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Homes
programme.desc: Drew and Jonathan aim to create a modern, spacious home from a choppy layout that is no longer functional for four adults living under one roof.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Homes
programme.desc: Drew and Jonathan update the awkward floor plan of a single-story house with some 1970s quirks for two high school sweethearts who have moved 14 times in 15 years

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: Nick Knowles comes to the aid of Liz and Jason Liversidge, a Hull couple in desperate need of help in future-proofing their family home. Not long after getting married and starting a family, Jason was diagnosed with both Fabrys disease, which causes a build-up of poisonous toxins in the body, and Motor Neurone Disease, which drastically reduced his life expectancy. The pair also discovered that Jason would have passed Fabrys disease on to his two daughters, which means that once her husband is gone, Liz will need all the help she can get in managing her childrens condition. Nick joins forces with designer Oliver Heath and an army of volunteers to put together a home in which Jason can build meaningful memories with his girls, but one which also gives Liz the best chance of providing for their future needs

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: The Top 10 face a Mystery Box containing an air fryer that they must use cook a delicious dish for the judges

programme.title: Inside the Ambulance
